LinesAnswers.name: initial
LinesAnswers.line: I don't know you, and in my business I value only real acquaintances, but you look like a provincial pauper.

LinesAnswers.name: majorGirlHasShuba
LinesAnswers.line: I've been told through serious channels that you're a good person to deal with. If you want to have real connections, I suggest you do me a favor. In the far compartment sits the arthritic champion of the 80s, he had the misfortune to refuse to have a drink with me yesterday. In the meantime, it was my special day, the hundredth anniversary of the opening of my beloved Swiss bank. Get to the point, make the grandfather regret his mistake. It's useful to know people like me, you know.

LinesAnswers.name: majorReasksAboutQuest
LinesAnswers.line: So, how is the old man doing?
